thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our Top NYC Pick
thread.title_full: Our Top NYC Pick - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Seth F
title: Our Top NYC Pick
text:
Hip, beautifully decorated lobby, cool bar lounge, excellent buffet breakfast, and a perfect midtown location (off Times Square, but not crazy-making). Couldn't ask for more. Small, but immaculate rooms that still show their Philippe Starck design are appropriately priced and repeat customer upgrades and specials are an added plus. I highly recommend this well-appointed hotel.
Room Tip: Select the wifi/buffet breakfast package for your best value. See more room tips
